hanzi-su-wiki:
塊

Значения

Ком, глыба, кусок, груда

Мнемоника

Земля 土 при засыпке могилы покойника 鬼 падает комьями.

Варианты

块
purpleculture_pinyin:
kuài
lump (of earth); chunk; piece; classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc; (coll.) classifier for money and currency units
ком (земли); кусок; кусок; классификатор для тряпок, торта, мыла и т. д .; (колл.) классификатор денег и денежных единиц

Pictophonetic: 鬼 indicates the sound; 土 (earth) conveys the meaning.

heisig_chinese_memo: Lump somehow reminds me of a golem... a ghost made from a lump of soil.
heisig_constituent: clod, soil, dirt, ground, ghost, oni, drop, brains, rice field, human legs, elbow
koohiiStory1: Without any weapons, our only defense was to throw clods of dirt at the advancing oni horde. (Adapted from dingomick because zombie was used as a primitive for drag+rag).
koohiiStory2: All too often I find myself vaccuming clods of dirt with my Dirt Devil.
jp_example_words: 塊(かたまり): lump, mass, clod, cluster
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A dirt demon is just a lump. Just like a dust bunny is just a clump of dust.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture a lump of dirt. Is there a demon hiding under there? No. It's just a saying, ya nerd.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Have you ever heard of the game "Katamari Damacy?" That game is about a little guy who rolls a ball around, turning it into a bigger and bigger lump. What do you think the Katamari (かたまり) part means? It means lump, of course.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: If you don't know the game and have never heard the music (especially), it's great stuff! If you have, this word will be really easy for you. If you haven't, look it up!
Ru_Radicals: 儿 (ножки), 匕 (ложка), 厶 (значок МУ), 土 (земля), 田 (рисовое поле), 鬼 (чёрт)
Ru_trainchinese:
kuài: (сч.слово) (разг.) счетное слово для основной денежной единицы Китая (одинак. с "юань")
kuài: (сущ/сч.слово) часть, кусок
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the ogre (鬼) turns the ground (土) into clods
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: After the guillotine drops and heads hit the ground, they become nothing more than a lump on top of the soil.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " earth " and " ghost ", it is written as "凷", which means soil block. "Said Wen": "Cong also. From the soil, (一)[凵]. [凵] Qu pictogram." "Mandarin ‧ Jin Yu 4": "(Chonger) over the five deer, begging for food at the savage, savage and Kuaiyi With it." Wei Zhao's note: "Block, 墣 also."

" Lump " can also refer to things that are lumps or clumps. In the Northern Wei Dynasty Jia Sixie's "Qi Min Yao Shu ‧ Zuo Yin Method": "I use my hand to put the urn into the urn and break small pieces."

" Block " can mean the whole. Tang Liu Zongyuan's "Pei Wei Fu": "Miao Yu is born here and now, it's a natural mellow."

" Block " can also mean loneliness. "Chu Ci‧Dongfangshuo "Seven Admonitions‧First Release"": "A piece of Juju, a place for Taoism." Wang Yi's note: "A piece, alone appearance."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " earth " and " ghost ", it is commonly written as "凷", the original meaning is soil block.
humanum_full_description:
從「土」，「鬼」聲，俗寫作「凷」，本義為土塊。《說文》：「墣也。从土、(一)[凵]。[凵]屈象形。」 《國語‧晉語四》：「(重耳)過五鹿，乞食於野人，野人與塊以與之。」韋昭注：「塊，墣也。」

　　「塊」也可指成疙瘩或成團的東西。北魏賈思勰《齊民要術‧作酢法》：「又以手就甕裏，搦破小塊。」

　　「塊」可表示整體。唐柳宗元〈佩韋賦〉：「邈予生此下都兮，塊天質之愨醇。」

　　「塊」還可表示孤獨。《楚辭‧東方朔〈七諫‧初放〉》：「塊兮鞠，當道宿。」王逸注：「塊，獨處貌。」
humanum_short_description: 從「土」，「鬼」聲，俗寫作「凷」，本義為土塊。

塊(かたまり): lump, mass, clod, cluster

從「 土 」，「 鬼 」聲，俗寫作「 凷 」，本義為土塊。《說文》：「墣也。从土、(一)[凵]。[凵]屈象形。」 《國語‧晉語四》：「(重耳)過五鹿，乞食於野人，野人與塊以與之。」韋昭注：「塊，墣也。」 「 塊 」也可指成疙瘩或成團的東西。北魏賈思勰《齊民要術‧作酢法》：「又以手就甕裏，搦破小塊。」 「 塊 」可表示整體。唐柳宗元〈佩韋賦〉：「邈予生此下都兮，塊天質之愨醇。」 「 塊 」還可表示孤獨。《楚辭‧東方朔〈七諫‧初放〉》：「塊兮鞠，當道宿。」王逸注：「塊，獨處貌。」
From the sound of " earth" and " ghost", it is written as " 凷", which means soil block. "Said Wen": "Cong also. From the soil, (一)[凵]. [凵] Qu pictogram." "Mandarin ‧ Jin Yu 4": "(Chonger) over the five deer, begging for food at the savage, savage and Kuaiyi With it." Wei Zhao's note: "Block, 墣 also." " Lump" can also refer to things that are lumps or clumps. In the Northern Wei Dynasty Jia Sixie's "Qi Min Yao Shu ‧ Zuo Yin Method": "I use my hand to put the urn into the urn and break small pieces." " Block" can mean the whole. Tang Liu Zongyuan's "Pei Wei Fu": "Miao Yu is born here and now, it's a natural mellow." " Block" can also mean loneliness. "Chu Ci‧Dongfangshuo "Seven Admonitions‧First Release"": "A piece of Juju, a place for Taoism." Wang Yi's note: "A piece, alone appearance."

塊字的基本解释

塊
kuài
见“块”。

塊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuài］
［《廣韻》苦對切，去隊，溪。］
［《集韻》苦怪切，去怪，溪。］
亦作“凷1”。亦作“圦1”。亦作“墤2”。亦作“1”。“块1”的繁体字。“魁3”的被通假字。“蕢3”的被通假字。
(1)土块。
(2)成疙瘩或成团的东西。
(3)特指郁结的心思。
(4)浑然一体；整体。
(5)安然。参见“塊然”。
(6)孤独；孑然。
(7)量词。用于块状、片状的东西。
(8)量词。货币的单位，相当于“圆”。多用于口语。
(9)方言。附在“这、那、哪”等之后表示地点、处所，相当于“里”。
(10)通“餽”。馈赠。
(11)通“魁”。

塊字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　塊； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页235第01
【唐韻】苦對切【集韻】苦怪切【韻會】苦潰切【正韻】苦夬切，?音蒯。【說文】墣也。【博物志】徐州人謂塵土爲蓬塊。【左傳·僖二十三年】晉公子重耳出亡，過衞，衞不爲禮，出于五鹿。乞食於野人，野人與之塊。　又【儀禮·喪服】凡喪居倚廬，寢苦枕塊。　又造物之名曰大塊。【莊子·大宗師】大塊載我以形，勞我以生。【郭璞·江賦】煥大塊之流形。　又壘塊，胷中不平也。【世說】晉阮籍胷中壘塊，故須酒澆之。　又銜塊，請罪也。【唐書·?宗紀】天寶末，安祿山反，帝欲禪位太子。楊貴妃銜塊請死，帝意沮，乃止。　又孑也。一曰楚人謂我曰塊。【楚辭·九辯】塊獨守此無澤兮，仰浮雲而永歎。【陸機·文賦】塊孤立而特峙，非常音之所緯。　又【類篇】苦會切，音檜。義同。　又與蕢通。互見凷字註。

[①]［kuài］
["Guangyun" cut bitterly, went to the team, Xi. ]
["Jiyun" is bitter and strange, go to blame, Xi. ]
Also known as "凷1". Also known as "圦1". Also known as "墤2". Also known as "1". "Block 1" in traditional characters. "Qui 3" was passed falsely. "蒉3" was passed falsely.
(1) Soil blocks.
(2) Things that are lumps or clumps.
(3) Especially the slumped mind.
(4) One whole; the whole.
(5) Enron. See "Block Ran".
(6) Lonely; lonely.
(7) Quantifiers. Used for lumpy and flaky things.
(8) Quantifiers. The unit of currency is equivalent to "round". Mostly used in spoken language.
(9) Dialects. Attached to "this, that, where", etc., indicate the location and location, which is equivalent to "li".
(10) Through "feed". Gift.
(11) Through "Kui".

вм. 块
Radicals: 土, 鬼  (dirt, demon)
Meaning Mnemonic
A dirt demon is just a lump. Just like a dust bunny is just a clump of dust.
Picture a lump of dirt. Is there a demon hiding under there? No. It's just a saying, ya nerd.
Reading Mnemonic
Have you ever heard of the game "Katamari Damacy?" That game is about a little guy who rolls a ball around, turning it into a bigger and bigger lump. What do you think the Katamari (かたまり) part means? It means lump, of course.
If you don't know the game and have never heard the music (especially), it's great stuff! If you have, this word will be really easy for you. If you haven't, look it up!
